LanguageData.INSSlab_Fibre.label: Insulation slab (fibres)
LanguageData.INSSlab_Fibre.description: Insulation material formed into a workable slab. Can be recycled to burlap.
LanguageData.INS_Burlap.label: Burlap
LanguageData.INS_Burlap.description: Crude fabric woven from insulation fibers. Similar to cloth but with better insulating properties.
